Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Each round you may perform one of the following actions as a free action: [EVASIVE] [TARGET LOCK] [SCAN] [BATTLE STATIONS]. You may use this action even if your ship does not have it in the Action bar.

Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If you are attacked this round at Range 1, Roll 2 attack dice. Any [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result damages the attacking ship as normal, even if your ship is destroyed by their attack. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice.

Captain.Title: Nu'Daq
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] result into a [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: Toreth
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 [HIT] result into a [CRITICAL] result.

Captain.Title: Khan Singh
Captain.Ability: You may use any Upgrades without paying a faction penalty. During an attack, if you spend a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token, each of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results become a [CRITICAL] instead of a [HIT].

Captain.Title: Khan Singh
Captain.Ability: (Gen-Con Promo) You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Khan or any Talent Upgrade to your ship. If any Captain in play has a higher Skill Number than Khan, Khan's Skill Number equals that Captains Skill Number.

Captain.Title: Clark Terell
Captain.Ability: Any friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: James T. Kirk
Captain.Ability: Any Federation [TALENT] Upgrades you purchase for Kirk cost exactly 3 Squadron Points and are placed face down beside his card. Each Talent remains face down until you decide to use it, and then it is turned face up for the rest of the game.

Captain.Title: Christopher Pike
Captain.Ability: All of your [CREW] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

Captain.Title: Donatra
Captain.Ability: All other friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Tomalak
Captain.Ability: When firing at Range 3 the defending ship does not roll an extra defense die.

Captain.Title: Mirok
Captain.Ability: After you move, if at least one friendly ship is within Range 1 of your ship, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

Captain.Title: Koloth
Captain.Ability: Each time an enemy ship attacks you, you may force that ship to re-roll 1 attack die of your choice.

Captain.Title: Krell
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: After you move, choose 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 whose Captain has a lower Skill than Martok's. The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free Action.

Captain.Title: Gowron
Captain.Ability: ACTION:Â All other friendly Klingon ships within Range 1-2 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Ranor
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 [STRAIGHT] or 2 [STRAIGHT] maneuver. Place an Auxiliary Power Token next to your ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Danar
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 blank result.

Captain.Title: Thot Gor
Captain.Ability: All your [WEAPON] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

Captain.Title: Sar
Captain.Ability: When defending, your ship rolls 1 extra defense die.

Captain.Title: Daimon Tog
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 of your non-disabled Crew Upgrades and then disable 1 Crew Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target all friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship whose Captains have a lower Skill than Martok's. The target ships gain +1 attack die and may re-roll 1 of their attack dice this round.

Captain.Title: Letant
Captain.Ability: Each round, when defending, you may force one opponent to re-roll one of their [CRITICAL] results.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: Once per round, you may re-roll any one of your attack or defense dice.

Captain.Title: Kira Nerys
Captain.Ability: If a [CREW] Upgrade on an enemy ship would cause your ship to discard or disable any of your Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Kira Nerys to a Federation ship.

Captain.Title: Gorkon
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable Gorkon to perform this Action. Your ship and every ship that attacks you this round rolls 2 less attack dice.

Captain.Title: Chang
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Spend your target lock to perform this action. Disable the Captain Card on the ship that was target locked.

Captain.Title: Valdore
Captain.Ability: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, add +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: Disable Weyoun to prevent 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades from being disabled or discarded this round.

Captain.Title: Luaran
Captain.Ability: One of your Dominion Upgrades costs -2 Squadron Points.

Captain.Title: Worf
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Kurn
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Dukat
Captain.Ability: Your ship may perform an [EVASIVE] or a [BATTLE STATIONS] Action as a free Action each round.

Captain.Title: Gul Evek
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Data
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable one of your [CREW] upgrades and one of your [WEAPON] upgrades to target all cloaked ship at range 1-3. They immediately flip their cloak tokens to the red side.

Captain.Title: Alidar Jarok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard your [TALENT] upgrade to target 1 ship at range 1-2. Neither of your ships may attack each other this round.

Captain.Title: Hikaru Sulu
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable one of your [CREW] upgrades to remove an opponent's [TARGET LOCK] token from your ship. Remove the corresponding token from the opponent's ship as well.

Captain.Title: Styles
Captain.Ability: Add 1 additional [TECH] icon to your ship's upgrade bar.

Captain.Title: Thot Pran
Captain.Ability: When Attacking with an Energy Dissipator, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Rudolph Ransom
Captain.Ability: When defending, if there is an [EVASIVE] token beside your ship, roll +2 defense dice.

Captain.Title: Maxwell Burke
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to gain +2 attack dice this round.

Captain.Title: Somraw Commander
Captain.Ability: Each time you attack at Range 3, if you do not have an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, you may add +1 attack die. If you add the attack die, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Romulan Commander
Captain.Ability: ACTION: During the Combat Phase this round, your ship attacks before every other ship. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: Add up to 2 additional [CREW] Upgrade slots to you ship's Upgrade Bar. The cost of these Upgrades is -1 SP each if they are Dominion [CREW] Upgrades.

Captain.Title: Gelnon
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target an enemy ship in your forward firing arc within Range 1 and immediately roll 2 attack dice. The target ship does not toll any defense dice against this attack and sustains damage as normal for each [HIT] or [CRITICAL]. If you roll at least 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] result, place a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Kira Nerys
Captain.Ability: ACTION: All other friendly ships within Range 1-2 of your ship may immediately perform a [TARGET LOCK] Action as a Free Action, if possible.

Captain.Title: Tahna Los
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] icon to your ship's upgrade bar. One of the [TECH] upgrades you purchase for Tahna Los's ship costs exactly 3 squadron points and is placed face down beside his card; this upgrade cannot refer to a specific ship or class of ship. This upgrade remains face down until you decide to use it, and then it is turned face up for the rest of the game.

Captain.Title: Kathryn Janeway
Captain.Ability: When your ship performs an [EVASIVE], [SCAN] or [BATTLE STATIONS] Action, you may place an additional token of the appropriate type beside your ship. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable Chakotay to allow two different crew Upgrades to perform their Actions during the same Round.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 4 Drone Tokens on this card. When attacking, you may spend 1 Drone Token to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Captain.Title: Culluh
Captain.Ability: After you move, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action this round.

Captain.Title: Rettik
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Bioship Alpha Pilot
Captain.Ability: Each round during the Planning Phase, after all other players have chosen their Maneuvers, target a ship within Range 1 of your ship, look at that ship's chosen Maneuver, and then choose your Maneuver. the target ship's player cannot change the chosen Maneuver after you have looked at it. You may not perform any Actions the round you use this ability.

Captain.Title: Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

Captain.Title: Loskene
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target 1 friendly ship that is not within Range 1-3 of your ship and whose Captain has a lower Skill than Loskene's. Target ship may immediately perform an additional 1 or 2 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn). The additional Maneuver must be on the target ship's Maneuver Dial.

Captain.Title: Soval
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2. Remove 1 [SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] Token from beside the target ship. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Tavek
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar.

Captain.Title: Lenaris Holem
Captain.Ability: Each time you are attacked, if you have an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice.

Captain.Title: Hazar
Captain.Ability: If your ship is within Range 1 of a Planet Token or an Obstacle, all attacks made against your ship are at -1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. After you spend a [TARGET LOCK] Token to re-roll your dice, you may spend 3 Drone Tokens to maintain your Target Lock on the target ship (i.e., do not remove the [TARGET LOCK] Tokens from beside either ship).

Captain.Title: Borg Queen
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 8 Drone Tokens on this card. Once per round, you may discard 1 Drone Token to perform 1 Action from your ship's Action Bar as a free Action. If another Borg ship is in your fleet when your ship is destroyed, you may replace that ship's Captain Card with this card. If you do so, discard that Captain Card and all Drone Tokens from both cards. Then place 8 Drone Tokens on this card.

Captain.Title: Gorn Commander
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: K'Nera
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. The target ship may choose to disable one of its [CREW] Upgrades (of its choice). If the target ship chooses not to disable 1 of its [CREW] Upgrades or if it has no [CREW] Upgrades that are not already disabled, you gain +1 attack die to all of your attacks against that ship this round.

Captain.Title: Liviana Charvanek
Captain.Ability: Whenever one of your [CREW] Upgrades is supposed to be disabled, roll 1 defense die. If you roll a [BATTLESTATIONS] result, that Upgrade is not disabled. If you are disabling the [CREW] Upgrade to perform its Action or ability, that Action or ability is still performed even if the Upgrade does not disable.

Captain.Title: Michael Eddington
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 3 Mission Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship a Range 1-3 and discard 1 Mission Token from this card. Target ship rolls -2 attack dice against your ship for each of its attacks this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Damar
Captain.Ability: All attacks made against your ship with Secondary Weapons are at -1 attack die. All attacks made against your ship with Minefields are at -2 attack dice.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Maxwell
Captain.Ability: Immediately before you move, you may change your Maneuver. If you do so, discard t his card during the End Phase.

Captain.Title: Mr. Spock
Captain.Ability: Your ship may perform a [TARGET LOCK] or [SCAN] Action as a free Action each round.

Captain.Title: Will Decker
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may destroy one of your Active Shields to add 1 additional [CRIT] result to your attack roll.

Captain.Title: Hugh
Captain.Ability: All of your [CREW] Upgrades cost -1 SP. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any Borg Upgrades to your ship.

Captain.Title: Lore
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die for that attack. You may assign any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade to your ship, regardless of Faction restriction, and you do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade to your ship.

Captain.Title: Keevan
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2 in your forward firing arc. Your ship cannot attack any other ship this round and must attack that ship, if possible. During the Combat Phase, if your ship attacks with its Primary Weapon, it resolves its attack immediately before the target ship, as if it had a higher Captain Skill than that ship. If the target ship attacks your ship this round, it gains +4 attack dice.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Mission Tokens on this card. ACTION: Spend 1 Mission Token from this card to target a ship within Range 1-3 of your ship. Target ship cannot attack your ship this round. You cannot attack this round.

Captain.Title: Vanik
Captain.Ability: All of your Vulcan and Federation [TECH] Upgrades cost -2 SP.

Captain.Title: James T. Kirk
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable one Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Dukat
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon this round, gain +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Magnus Hansen
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the combat phase, you may spend 1 [SCAN] token to add 1 additional [EVASIVE] result to your defense roll. You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning Magnus to a Federation ship.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, if your ship is in the forward firing arc of 2 or more ships, roll 1 extra defense die against all attacks from those ships. Each time your ship receives a Damage Card (normal or critical), incrase your Captain Skill by +1 for the rest of the game (max +2). The bonus Skill remains even if the damage is later repaired.

Captain.Title: Jonathan Archer
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your [CREW] Upgrades. For each [CREW] Upgrade you disabled with this Action, gain +1 attack die when attacking with your Primary Weapon AND increase your Skill Number by +1 until the End Phase.

Captain.Title: J. Hayes
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die this round. At the end of the Combat Phase, suffer 1 normal damage to your Hull.

Captain.Title: Maxwell Forrest
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).

Captain.Title: Sopek
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Choose 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades that was discarded from your ship on a previous round. Re-deploy that [CREW] Upgrade to your ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Kuvak
Captain.Ability: After you move, if you perform an [EVADE] Action, you may place 2 [EVADE] Tokens beside your ship instead of 1 if your ship is not in the forward firing arc of any enemy ships.

Captain.Title: V'Las
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Third of Five
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 3 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll +1 defense die. You cannot assign this card to the same ship or fleet as Hugh.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Drone Tokens on this card. Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll 1 attack die. A [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result damages the attacking ship as normal. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice against this.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Disable all of your remaining Shields and immediately perform an additional green or white maneuver.

Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: Each time you perform a [BATTLESTATIONS], an [EVASIVE MANEUVERS], or a [TARGET LOCK] Action, place 1 additional Token of the appropriate type ([BATTLESTATIONS], [EVASIVE MANEUVERS], or [TARGET LOCK]) on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 Token from this card and perform the corresponding Action as a free Action.

Captain.Title: Bok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die to each of your attacks and roll -1 defense die each time you defend this round.

Captain.Title: Elim Garak
Captain.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to roll +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Haron
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. All of your Kazon [WEAPON] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Activation Phase, before you move, you may spend 1 Drone Token to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Solok
Captain.Ability: You may perform an [EVASIVE MANEUVERS] or a [SCAN] Action as a free Action each round. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TALENT] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Salatrel
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. For the rest of the game, during each Combat Phase, if a ship of that Faction is in your forward firing arc, treat your Captain Skill Number as if it were a 10 until the End Phase of that round.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar. ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar. ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 5 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 of your Drone Tokens to force your opponent to roll 1 less defense die.
